titleInfo.title: Dataset for "Second order cumulants of conserved charge fluctuations revisited: Vanishing chemical potentials"

mods.abstract: Data publication for "Second order cumulants of conserved charge fluctuations revisited: Vanishing chemical potentials", arXiv:2107.10011. Contains data for all figures shown in the publication, two lists of hadrons used in comparisons of lattice QCD data with hadron resonance gas model calculations (QMHRG2020 and PDGHRG2020), and a file specifying the conversion of the gauge field coupling beta to temperature using two different physical observables, the slope parameter r1 extracted from the static quark potential and the kaon decay constant fK.
